mapper.select: SELECT n.NOTI_ID, ALERT_TIME, CONTENT, RECEIVER_ID, "READ", GUBUN, NTYPE FROM NOTIFICATION n JOIN RECEIVER r ON n.NOTI_ID = r.NOTI_ID WHERE r.RECEIVER_ID = #{id}

SELECT a.NOTI_ID, ALERT_TIME, CONTENT, RECEIVER_ID, "READ", GUBUN, NTYPE FROM ( SELECT n.NOTI_ID, ALERT_TIME, CONTENT, GUBUN, NTYPE, r.RECEIVER_ID, r."READ" ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY r.RECEIVER_ID ORDER BY n.ALERT_TIME DESC) AS rn FROM NOTIFICATION n INNER JOIN RECEIVER r ON n.NOTI_ID = r.NOTI_ID WHERE r.RECEIVER_ID = #{id} AND r."READ" = 'N' ) a WHERE a.rn < 6
